results.title: Effect of amlodipine on the progression of atherosclerosis and the occurrence of clinical events. PREVENT Investigators.
results.text_hl: In contrast, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ had a significant effect in slowing the 36-month progression of @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid artery atherosclerosis@@@: the placebo group experienced a 0.033-mm increase in IMT, whereas there was a 0. 0126-mm decrease in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group (P:=0.007).

results.title: Role of TGF-beta1/Smads pathway in carotid artery remodeling in renovascular hypertensive rats and prevention by Enalapril and Amlodipine
results.text_hl: @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_59086 @@@TGF-beta1@@@/Smads pathway may participate in the mechanism of @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid artery remodeling@@@ in @DISEASE_Rat_Bite_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D011906 @@@RHR@@@; the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ in inversing @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Artery_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002340 @@@carotid artery remodeling@@@ may be related to the change of @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_59086 @@@TGF-beta1@@@/Smads pathway, the combination treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ had better effects than single administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@.
